meanings.definition: A South Asian dish made with highly seasoned rice and meat or fish.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat biriani on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best biriani in town.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone rushed to get a taste of the delicious biriani.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of biriani filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful biriani looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.sent1: I will biriani the ingredients for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She birianied the dish with care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: When in doubt, just biriani your way through the recipe.
meanings.sent4: He birianied the meal to perfection, impressing everyone at the table.
meanings.sent5: Birianing the biriani requires patience and skill to get it just right.
